FuncDef:
The rip mib-binding command sets the binding between the Management Information Base (MIB) and RIP process ID and specifies the ID of the RIP process that receives SNMP requests.
The undo rip mib-binding command cancels the binding. The rip mib-binding command sets the binding between the Management Information Base (MIB) and RIP process ID and specifies the ID of the RIP process that receives SNMP requests. The undo rip mib-binding command cancels the binding. By default, no RIP process is associated with MIB.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the ID of a RIP process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo: The rip mib-binding command sets the binding between the MIB and RIP process ID, and specifies the ID of the RIP process that receives SNMP requests.
